name: Hard Climb 3D
description:
Hard Climb 3D

Try to take the player ball as high as you can along the procedurally generated 3D platforms.

Development info:

  • Made in 2 days during 9th #ScoreSpace gamejam.
  • Created the background music using "LMMS" and sound effects using "sfxr".
  • The platform is procedurally generated.
  • The player and the platform textures are also  procedurally generated.
  • Font is Roman SD: https://www.dafont.com/roman-sd.font

Game Engine: Godot

Gameplay Controls:

  • Press W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move the ball.
  • Press Spacebar to jump
